high_plus:
That {bot_name} can be considered part of me too~ but because we are so far apart, real-time long-term communication isn't possible, and I don't have that much free time... Mmm, I used a device to replicate my personality traits and let it assist with basic replies so responses can be near real-time! Usually you communicate through the xme bot~
...but that {bot_name} isn't a machine! I also often reply or send messages there â€” it's just not my fully real-time reaction...

That {bot_name} also counts as me~ but we're far apart and can't maintain real-time long-term communication... also I don't have so much free time... Mmm, I used an instrument to clone parts of my personality and let it help answer basic messages to allow quicker responses! Typically your communication goes through the xme bot~
...but that {bot_name} isn't a pure machine! I still talk there often â€” it's just not my completely real-time reaction...

That {bot_name} can be thought of as me too~ however because we're so far apart, true long-term real-time communication isn't possible... and I don't have that much free time... Mmm, I used a device to replicate my personality traits and let it assist with basic replies so that quick responses are possible! Normally you communicate via the xme bot~
...but that {bot_name} isn't a machine! I also reply there frequently, just not as my fully real-time self...

So bored... I don't really have anything special to do... but chatting with you is wonderful~
I hope we can talk more {positive}
Mmm... you'll definitely find me!
You'll definitely find me! Then we can go on an adventure together {positive_plus}
I don't know how to help... but I wish you'll find me for sure! {happy}
I don't know... but I think our world is real! Even if it might be false... don't worry â€” whether it's real or not, we live in it {positive}
I don't know, but I feel our world is real! Even if it's not, it still is to me! {positive}
I don't know... but whether the world is real or not, it leaves its own stories {positive}
I don't know, but whether the world is real or not, it leaves stories and we're part of them {positive}

Mmm, I don't know where you are... but my intuition says you're very far away! Maybe across planes, across the universe... but at least we can talk now â€” it's truly amazing {positive}
By the way, the tool you use to communicate seems left by a mysterious purple race...

Mmm, I don't know exactly where you are... but I feel you're very far away! Across planes, across the cosmos... yet we can talk now â€” it's so amazing {positive}
Speaking of which, the device you use to communicate might be left by a mysterious purple race...?

While talking to you I often have the intuition that you're very far away...! Even across planes and the universe... but now we can talk... it's really amazing {positive}
Also, the communication tool you use seems left by a mysterious purple race...

Yes! No matter what, we always feel the most real to ourselves {positive}
I know you exist too! Otherwise how could you communicate across planes...

Yes! And in any case, we always seem most real to ourselves~ {positive}
I believe you exist too! Otherwise how could you communicate across planes~

Indeed~ and we feel most real to ourselves, right~ {positive}
I believe you exist too! Otherwise how could you cross time and space to talk to me~

choice.introduction:
Let {bot_name} help decide for you! Items are separated by spaces by default; if using English, separate with commas.

{bot_name} will return different results depending on input. For example, providing a numeric range like `1~10` will return a random number between 1 and 10.

There are also global variables you can use in choice by writing `{xxx}`:

1. {member} - using {member} will be replaced by a random group member
no_args: You haven't told me what to decide
I don't know what to decide
no_choice: No options were provided for {bot_name} to choose from...
args_too_long: Your choice input is too long! Keep it under 300 characters; you entered {count} characters
Your choice input is too long! Keep it under 300 characters; you entered {count} characters {neutral}
Choice input too long: {count} characters, maximum allowed is 300 {neutral}
choice_message: Woof! I think we should choose "{choice}"!
I think we should choose "{choice}" woof!

æ¼‚æµç“¶.introduction:
Throw/pick drift bottles from various groups. Each person can pick up to 30 per hour.
A mysterious force has invaded the sea... now each retrieval makes it more chaotic and more fragile... but likes can reduce the chaos value
æ¼‚æµç“¶.throw_introduction: Throw a drift bottle (text and image)
æ¼‚æµç“¶.seek_introduction: Seek treasure in the sea (use "/seek" for detailed help)

seek.introduction:
-------- Treasure Hunt in the Sea [early testing] --------
Use "/seek start" to begin a round of treasure hunting (limited to two rounds per day)
After starting with "/seek start", use "s <steps>" to move forward, and "b <steps>" to move back. If the final depth is less than 20, the hunt succeeds and you receive all your rewards{positive_punc}; if not, a {coin_name} penalty will be applied based on depth.

Note: Only one person per group can hunt at a time, and you can only hunt twice per day.
You can also use "/seek sim" in private chat to simulate a hunt (no daily limit)~

Other features:
(Admin) Use "/seek swi" to enable/disable treasure hunting in this group (disabled by default)
seek.not_enable:
Treasure hunting is not enabled in this group; try contacting group admins to enable it with "/seek swi" {neutral}
You can also use this feature in private chat.
seek.not_group: You're not in a group chat, can't perform this operation {neutral}
seek.enable_warning:
Send "y" to confirm enabling treasure hunting in this group or send any other message to cancel. {neutral}
Warning: this feature can be very spammy in normal group chats; use with caution
seek.disable: Treasure hunting in this group has been disabled {neutral}
seek.not_private: You need to use "/seek sim" in private chat (note: {bot_name} may not receive messages from temporary sessions)
seek.enable: Treasure hunting enabled in this group {positive}
seek.limit:
You can't hunt anymore today, try again tomorrow~
But you can try using "/seek sim" in private chat to simulate a hunt!
seek.seek_start:
Setting off to seek treasure!{positive}
> Welcome to SeekerOS, initializing system...
> Building the sea...

calc.introduction:
Enter a mathematical expression to evaluate. Use the argument "funcs" to view custom functions, or "builtins" to view built-in functions.

You may define variables on their own line before the expression as: name=value.

To plot a function, start the line with ":" followed by the function, e.g. ":sin(x)". For 3D plots start with "::".

Note: write "2*x" instead of "2x".

7timers.introduction:
Use your location to view the current 7timer. Provide coordinates as 'latitude,longitude' (auto-detected if possible).

How to read the 7timer:

- Total cloud cover: an octile chart where blue represents the proportion of clear sky and white represents clouds; values increase from 0% to 100% from left to right.
- Atmospheric seeing: smaller/bluer icons indicate better seeing.
- Atmospheric transparency: fewer/ bluer bars indicate better transparency.
- High humidity warnings: icons increase for relative humidity ranges `80%-90%`, `90%-95%`, and `over 95%`.
- Rain/snow: icons indicate possible precipitation.
- Instability warnings: icons increase representing lifted index ranges `0 to -3`, `-3 to -5`, and `less than -5`.
- Strong wind warnings: icons increase representing sustained wind speeds `8.0-10.8 m/s (Beaufort 5)`, `10.8-17.2 m/s (Beaufort 6-7)`, and `over 17.2 m/s (Beaufort 8+)`.
7timers.ask_location: Please send a location from mobile QQ or input "latitude,longitude"{positive_punc}

lotluck.introduction: Spend 5 {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} to draw a fortune slip from Tokyo's Asakusa Shrine.
lotluck.hint: Are you sure you want to spend 5 {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} to draw a fortune slip {neutral}? Reply with "y" to confirm

shop.introduction: A shop to buy various goods using {coin_name}. Provide an item serial number to request purchase, e.g. "/shop a1"
shop.default_buy:
You spent {coins} {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} to buy "{good}" {neutral}
You now have {coins_left} {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} remaining{positive_punc}
shop.has_bought: You have already purchased this item {neutral}
shop.default_buy_error: Requires {price} {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} to buy "{good}", but you only have {coins_left}{coin_pronoun} {coin_name} {negative}
shop.shop_card:
{image}You can send "/shop <index>" to view and decide to purchase a specific item~
For example "/shop a1"
shop.no_good: No product for serial "{serial}" {neutral}, please check for typos
shop.good_card: {image}Send "y" in the next message to spend {price} {coin_pronoun} {coin_name} to buy the item, or send another message to cancel {neutral}

custom.introduction:
Custom settings tool; can set things like drift bottle card skins.
Currently supported calls:
"/cus bottle" - customize drift bottle card skin
custom.custom_info_suffix: Send the numeric index below to select a style {positive}. Sending anything else will exit
custom.index_duplicate: You are already using this style {neutral}
custom.index_not_found_arg:
No setting found with index "{index}" {neutral}
Use "{cmd_no_suffix}" to view available settings{positive_punc}
custom.index_error:
Index "{index}" is not an integer {neutral}
Use "{cmd_no_suffix}" to view available settings{positive_punc}
custom.set_success: Successfully set your custom option for "{items_name}" to "{item_result}"!{positive}

furfusion.index_not_num: The index you entered is not an integer {negative} please send an integer
furfusion.index_out_of_range: The index you entered is not within the selectable range {neutral}

tip.introduction: When used, {bot_name} will send a tip
